item.title: Amend git commits to remove added files
item.description: Removing files you just added and committed to git is easy with git commit --amend

item.title: Getting yasnippet to work with Org mode
item.description: There are various discussions around the conflict between Org Mode and yasnippet and how to fix it. This is how I got them to play nicely together. (use-package yasnippet :init (defun yas/org-very-safe-expand () (let ((yas/fallback-behavior 'return-nil)) (yas/expand))) :hook ((emacs-lisp-mode . yas-minor-mode) (python-mode . yas-minor-mode) (org-mode . yas-minor-mode) (org-mode . (lambda () (make-variable-buffer-local 'yas/trigger-key) (setq yas/trigger-key [tab]) (add-to-list 'org-tab-first-hook 'yas/org-very-safe-expand) (define-key yas/keymap [tab] 'yas/next-field)))) :config (setq-default yas-snippet-dirs `(,(expand-file-name "snippets/" user-emacs-directory))) (yas-reload-all)) GNU Emacs 28.

item.title: Find most recently changed files of a type
item.description: How would you find the .org (or .pdf, .doc, …) file you created the most recently?
